reviewDescription: I'm thoroughly impressed with the boAt Stone 193 Pro Bluetooth speaker, which delivers crystal-clear sound with its 5W signature sound output and has an impressive battery life of up to 12 hours. The speaker's sleek design and tropical blue color are eye-catching, and its feature-rich specifications, including TWS feature, built-in mic, Bluetooth v5.3, AUX port, TF card connectivity, and Type-C port, make it a versatile and convenient option. The IPX6 rating ensures protection against water and dust, making it perfect for outdoor use, and the build quality is solid and premium. Overall, I highly recommend the boAt Stone 193 Pro for its excellent sound quality, impressive battery life, and feature-rich specifications, making it an outstanding value for its price.
